com.decoded.polldancer - package com.decoded.polldancer
 

P

PollDancer - Class in com.decoded.polldancer
Poll dancer is a non blocking mechanism for callbacks.
PollDancer(ExecutorService, Runnable) - Constructor for class com.decoded.polldancer.PollDancer
 

S

setMaxTimeoutMs(long) - Method in class com.decoded.polldancer.PollDancer
Set the max timeout that poll dancer will wait before considering the operation to be "un-ending" and timeout.
setPollIntervalMs(long) - Method in class com.decoded.polldancer.PollDancer
The interval at which poll dancer will check for the focused object to be updated.
setPollTrigger(Supplier<Boolean>) - Method in class com.decoded.polldancer.PollDancer
Adds a wrapped supplier and triggers the poll dancer when the supplier is called.

The Trigger Callback
start() - Method in class com.decoded.polldancer.PollDancer
Starts the polling action (the PollDance)
stop() - Method in class com.decoded.polldancer.PollDancer

T

triggerNow() - Method in class com.decoded.polldancer.PollDancer
